column2: title=J.R.R. Tolkien's Letters to Rhona Beare
publisher=St. Louis, Mo.: [[The New England Tolkien Society]]

column1: '''''J.R.R. Tolkien's Letters to Rhona Beare''''' reproduces two letters from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] to [[Rhona Beare]] in full.
*[[Letter to Rhona Beare (14 October 1958)]] (corresponds to [[Letter 211]] in ''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'')
*[[Letter to Rhona Beare (8 June 1961)]] (corresponds to [[Letter 230]] in ''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'')
The booklet was published in a limited edition of 95 copies.<ref>{{webcite
column4: articlename=J.R.R. Tolkien's Letters to Rhona Beare. 1985
